B

Box - Class in s17cs350task1
Defines a two-dimensional box that can be connected to other boxes via Connectors in a doubly linked n-ary tree.
Box(String, Dimension2D) - Constructor for class s17cs350task1.Box
Creates a non-root box.
Box(String, Dimension2D, boolean) - Constructor for class s17cs350task1.Box
Creates a box that may be the root.

C

clone() - Method in class s17cs350task1.Box
Returns a deep clone of this box.
clone() - Method in class s17cs350task1.Connector
Returns a deep clone of this connector.
connectChild(Connector) - Method in class s17cs350task1.Box
Attaches a connector from a child box to this box.
Connector - Class in s17cs350task1
Defines a connector that belongs to a box.
Connector(Box, Point2D) - Constructor for class s17cs350task1.Connector
Creates a connector that attaches to a box playing the role of the child box.

G

getAbsoluteCenterPosition() - Method in class s17cs350task1.Box
Gets the center position of this box relative to the root box.
getChildBox() - Method in class s17cs350task1.Connector
Gets the child box to attach this connector to.
getChildBoxCount() - Method in class s17cs350task1.Box
Gets the total count of child boxes of this box.
getChildBoxes() - Method in class s17cs350task1.Box
Gets all the child boxes of this box.
getConnectorsToChildren() - Method in class s17cs350task1.Box
Gets the connectors that attach the child boxes to this box.
getConnectorToParent() - Method in class s17cs350task1.Box
Gets the connector that attaches this box to its parent, if it is connected (check with hasConnectorToParent()).
getDescendantBoxCount() - Method in class s17cs350task1.Box
Gets the total count of descendant boxes (children, their children, and so on) of this box.
getDescendantBoxes() - Method in class s17cs350task1.Box
Gets all the descendant boxes (children, their children, and so on) of this box.
getID() - Method in class s17cs350task1.Box
Gets the unique, arbitrary identifier.
getOffsetFromParentBox() - Method in class s17cs350task1.Connector
Gets the signed distance from the center of the parent box to the center of the child box.
getParentBox() - Method in class s17cs350task1.Connector
Gets the parent box that this connector is attached to, if it is attached (check with Connector.hasParentBox()).
getSize() - Method in class s17cs350task1.Box
Gets the size.

H

hasConnectorToParent() - Method in class s17cs350task1.Box
Gets whether this box is connected to a parent box; i.e., it has a connector.
hasParentBox() - Method in class s17cs350task1.Connector
Gets whether this connector is attached to a parent box.

I

isRoot() - Method in class s17cs350task1.Box
Gets whether this box is the root of the composition tree.

S

s17cs350task1 - package s17cs350task1
 
setConnectorToParent(Connector) - Method in class s17cs350task1.Box
Sets the connector that attaches this box to its parent.
setParentBox(Box) - Method in class s17cs350task1.Connector
